name: Only one word (little-burrito)
description:
Receive a Wikipedia article and find a word that occurs only once in the entire text.

Note: The game does not currently take into account text in info boxes.

---

With more time, I would have made the game flow better. More carefully chosen articles, maybe you have to do 5 in a row, a scoring system and simple online high scores.

For personal reasons, I could only work on this game for 10 hours on the Sunday, most of which went to figuring out how to get the data from Wikipedia without getting stuck in cross-domain security stuff.
